get.summary: New - Searches in apple app store for the applications with the specified search string and returns the details
New - Searches in google playstore for the applications with the specified search string and returns the details
New - Searches in Windows store for the applications with the specified search string and platform and returns the details
New - Gets the details of a public app identified by id.

post.summary: New - Inserts the public application selected by searching for the bundle ID (Android) or external ID (iOS) in the app market.

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The application entity to be inserted.

put.summary: New - Updates the public application selected by searching for the bundle ID (Android) or external ID (iOS) in the app market.

post.summary: Adds the public boxer flex assignment.

get.summary: Gets the public application boxer flex assignment.

post.summary: New - Assigns a Smart Group to an Public Application.
New - Assigns Smart Groups to an BSP Application.

CurrentVersion.description: Current version of App in AppStore

LargeIcon.description: Large Icon Url of the application

MediumIcon.description: Medium Icon Url of the application

SmallIcon.description: Small Icon Url of the application

AppStoreUrl.description: App Store Url of the application

ScreenshotImages.description: List of urls for screenshot images

ApplicationName.description: Gets or sets the Application Name.

LargeIconUrl.description: Gets or sets Large Icon Url of the App.

MediumIconUrl.description: Gets or sets Medium Icon Url of the App.

SmallIconUrl.description: Gets or sets Small Icon Url of the App.

IconId.description: Gets or sets Icon Blob Id of the App.

ApplicationUrl.description: Gets or sets the url for the Application.

ApplicationSource.description: Gets or sets the application source.

AppSizeInKB.description: Gets or sets the size of the application.

Rating.description: Gets or sets the App Rating.

Version.description: Gets or sets the application version.

CategoryList.description: Gets or sets the application category list.

AppId.description: Gets or sets Bundle Id of the App.

Screenshots.description: Gets or sets the information related to App Screenshots.

PublisherInformation.description: Gets or sets the Application Publisher Information.

Price.description: Gets or sets the Application Price.

MinimumOsVersion.description: Gets or sets the Minimum OS Versions for the Application

Description.description: Gets or sets the Application Description.

Comments.description: Gets or sets the Comments for the Application.

DefaultScheme.description: Gets or sets the Application Default Scheme.

SmartGroupIds.description: Gets or sets the smart group id.

PushMode.description: Gets or sets the Push Mode for the Application.

IsAppRestrictedToSilentInstall.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether is app restricted to silent install.

RequireManagement.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether device should be enrolled to get the app.

AppTunneling.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether device should be enrolled to get the app.

UsesSdk.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether application uses AirWatch SDK.

SendAppConfig.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether App Configuration values should be sent along with the application.

RemoveOnUnEnroll.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the appslication should be removed on unenrollment.

PreventApplicationBackup.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether application back up will be prevented on the device.
Currently supported for iOS5.

AllowManagement.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether if admin chooses to assume management of User Installed Apps.

VpnProfileId.description: Gets or sets a value indicating the VPN Profile ID associated with the application.

VpnProfile.description: Gets or sets a value indicating the name of the VPN Profile associated with the application.

SdkSettingsProfileId.description: Gets or sets a value indicating the ID for the SDK settings profile associated with the app.

SdkSettingsProfile.description: Gets or sets a value indicating the name of the SDK settings associated with the application.

AppSettingProfileId.description: Gets or sets a value indicating the ID of the App Settings Profile applicable to the devices in this assignment.

AppSettingsProfile.description: Gets or sets a value indicating the name of the App settings associated with the application.

AppConfigs.description: Gets or sets the app configs.

Data.description: Gets or Sets the Image Data.

ResultType.description: Gets or Sets the of Image Data.

MimeType.description: Gets or Sets the Mime Type.

IRequestQuery.description:
Interface for IAwRequestQuery
This will hold all the required data for a request. Will be filled from ModelBinder

QueryParams.description: Gets or sets Query Parameters. For e.g. any query string parameters will be extracted to key,value pair and stored here.

TenantContext.description: Gets or sets IAwTenantContext. Will hold the tenant details, which will be filled as part of the tenant validation handler

RequestMethod.description: Gets or sets RequestMethod. Will be used to write custom rules

AllowedUriQueryChars.description: Gets or sets allowed Characters in Query String.

ITenantContext.description: Contract for TenantContext. Will be exposed from RequestQuery and will be injected to every controller actions and Business method

TenantCode.description: Gets or sets TenantCode. Uniquely identify the tenant for the request

OrganizationgroupId.description: Gets or sets Organization Group ID
